page.title: 11Brownies
page.content: Brownies is for girls aged seven to ten.Each pack has an adult leader called Brown Owl.In my brownie pack there are four sixes.The sixer is the head of the group of six. When you first start you do not wear the brownie uniform.During the six weeks before you are enrolled you have to learn the promise,law and motto. Every brownie has to know these.At enrolment your sixer takes you round a ring of brownies chanting a song. Brownies work for interest badges which include collectors,cook,athlete, and craft. Brownies wear a brown uniform and hat.Later on you can go up into the Guides.I go to brownies once a week and enjoy it a lot.
